Declare @vchSQL varchar(max) Declare @bigsql varchar(max)
set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + '] /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Usp_GetClosedLoanAccountReport] Script Date: 07/03/2012 13:06:16 ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[Usp_GetClosedLoanAccountReport]'') AND type in (N''P'', N''PC'')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[Usp_GetClosedLoanAccountReport] ' exec (@vchSQL)
set @vchSQL ='CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Usp_GetClosedLoanAccountReport] @PoolId varchar(10)
AS
BEGIN
SET NOCOUNT ON
declare @SourcePoolId bigint
select @SourcePoolId = DimSourcePoolId from tblDimPool where DimPoolID = @PoolId
select fl.DimPoolId, fl.DimReportingDateID, dl.AccountNo, dt.TrustID, fl.CurrentPrincipalBalance, fl.LoanMaturityDate, fl.LoanCloseDate, dl.LoanStatus from tblDimLoan dl inner join tblFactLoan fl on dl.DimPoolID = fl.DimPoolID and dl.DimLoanID = fl.DimLoanID left outer join view_DimTrust dt on fl.DimTrustID = dt.DimTrustID where dl.DimPoolID = @SourcePoolId and fl.IsIncluded = 1 and dl.AccountNo not in (select dl.AccountNo from tblDimLoan dl inner join tblFactLoan fl on dl.DimPoolID = fl.DimPoolID and dl.DimLoanID = fl.DimLoanID where dl.DimPoolID = @PoolId and fl.IsIncluded = 1) UNION
select fl.DimPoolId, fl.DimReportingDateID, dl.AccountNo, dt.TrustID, fl.CurrentPrincipalBalance, fl.LoanMaturityDate, fl.LoanCloseDate, dl.LoanStatus from tblDimLoan dl inner join tblFactLoan fl on dl.DimPoolID = fl.DimPoolID and fl.IsIncluded = 1 and dl.DimLoanID = fl.DimLoanID left outer join view_DimTrust dt on fl.DimTrustID = dt.DimTrustID where dl.DimPoolID = @PoolId and dl.LoanStatus = ''''CLOSE''''
END
' SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; EXEC (@BigSQL)
